TextBody:
Hi Veronica,

Sorry for the inconvenience, we have recently transitioned to a new ticketing platform.
Your ticket remains active, and internally we are currently awaiting a new image release that aims to address the identified vulnerabilities. As mentioned during our last remote session on this topic, we do not have an exact timeline for the new image, but we anticipate it will be available in Q3.
The reason you are currently seeing the status of your ticket as 'on hold' is due to this pending release. 

I have just sent the above update on the 00409840 as well. Just to confirm that the original ticket is still active, could you please check whether you are able to view the new update on the other ticket?

Thank you for your understanding,
 
Best Regards,

Elisa Roca | Technical Support Engineer

Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix

DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption

www.endpointprotector.com  



This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BO7ux:ref
Subject: Open Ticket about Updates    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BO7ux:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Veronica,

I have sent a meeting invite for Thursday from 01:00pm CDT. We would like to have a quick call and take a look to see if you experienced any other issues with regards to the Salesforce platform and the ticketing system in general after we migrated to the new ticketing platform.We just want to make sure that everything is okay with it and that you do not experience any issues with it.

Please find the Zoom meeting link below:
https://endpointprotector.zoom.us/j/83028384990

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption

Hi Veronica,

As per our call last week, we have raised the 2 questions internally regarding the Salesforce functionality.

I will get back to you as soon as I have an update on them.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer

- Verónica

 




From: Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 11, 2024 at 2:59 PM
To: Veronica Yessa <vyessa@chapman.com>
Cc: cristian@endpointprotector.com <cristian@endpointprotector.com>
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #410840 - - Open Ticket about Updates [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BO7ux:ref ]


Hi Veronica,

I have sent a meeting invite for Thursday from 01:00pm CDT. We would like to have a quick call and take a look to see if you experienced any other issues with regards to the Salesforce platform and the ticketing system in general after we migrated to the new ticketing platform.We just want to make sure that everything is okay with it and that you do not experience any issues with it.

Please find the Zoom meeting link below:
https://endpointprotector.zoom.us/j/83028384990

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
